name: Verjaded
description:
You are Noah: Teenage sadboy, MMO addict,  and aspiring songwriter

He is Jade: Teenage hothead, MMO addict, and generally kind of a dick

Made for the O2A2 Again Jam

This was the first game I've ever made and I wanna thank the hosts of the O2A2 Again Jam and the DevTalk discord for being easy to find things when you google "Best Visual Novel maker" because you saw Tyrano and VNMaker on sale on steam!
